function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Residents not adhering to COVID-19 preventive measures","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforce strict adherence to COVID-19 preventive measures through education and regulations","Technologies":"Contact tracing and monitoring technologies","People":"Residents, visitors, and community members","Owner":"Community leaders and health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of access to sufficient shopping facilities","Impact":"Increased need to travel to other areas for essentials, leading to potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improve access to local shopping facilities within the community","Technologies":"Online ordering and delivery services","People":"Community residents","Owner":"Community management and local businesses"},{"Description":"Lack of access to recreation facilities","Impact":"Increased likelihood of residents seeking recreation in crowded public spaces","Mitigation":"Provide safe and accessible recreation facilities within the community","Technologies":"Reservation systems and outdoor space management tools","People":"Community residents, especially families and individuals seeking recreation","Owner":"Community management"}]}
